document_data.name: Axe Grinders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Axe Grinders''' was a bodyguard business in [[Skullport]].
document_data.Geography: The business was located off in the [[Central Port of Skullport|Central Port]] district of Skullport, north of the [[Crossed Swords]] tavern and the [[Bane's Mistress]] [[festhall]].
document_data.Interior: The Axe Grinders was in poor condition.
document_data.Services: If a customer wanted a bodyguard to take on a more dangerous assignment, most enforcers at Axe Grinders would do it for triple price. Such missions included leaving Skullport or entering the [[Underhalls]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Many of the inhabitants of Axe Grinders were sellswords and down-on-their-luck mercenaries. Most bodyguards wore [[chainmail]] and fought with [[battleaxe]]s and [[longsword]]s.
document_data.History: Around [[1370 DR]], the business was owned by [[Alonyius Tackpun]], who hired out bodyguards to those who had coin to spend.
document_data.Prices:
* Services of bodyguard for 3 [[gp]] per day, plus meals.
* Dangerous assignments starting at 9 gp, plus meals.
